attributes.description:
Just in.. 2019 Toyota Land Cruiser 79 4.5 D Double-Cab .. 
All our Pre-Owned Vehicles undergo a stringent Multi-Point Check and Dekra Roadworthy before Delivery.
We Deliver Countrywide l Trade-ins Accepted l Finance also Available with all major Banks and a Test Drive is a must. Price Includes License Registration l Administration l On the Road Fees I 1 year Mechanical Warranty included.
attributes.title: 2019 Toyota Land Cruiser 79 4.5 D Double-Cab

attributes.description: 4 Wheel Drive, A/C, ABS, Airbags, Bluetooth, Rhino Man Canopy, Central Locking, Climate Control, Cruise Control, Diff Lock, Electric Mirrors, Electric Seats, Electric Windows, Full Service History, Keyless Entry, Leather Interior, LED Headlights, Mags, Multi-Functional Steering Wheel, Navigation, P/S, Parking Sensors, PDC, Radio/CD, Reverse Camera, Rubberized, Side Steps, Smash and Grab, Towbar, USB, Xenon Lights.  BB Group is a well-established Franchise with a wide variety. We strive to give excellent service. All Trade-ins are welcome. A Full and Detailed Workshop Quality Inspection is Done on Each of vehicles along with a AA Dekra Roadworthy test prior to any Delivery taken. This is to ensure peace of mind for each of our Valued customers. For Excellent Service Contact our Sales Manager - Ernest Smith As part of a 60-year legacy, this fully fledged automotive dealer group offers New cars, Used Cars, Parts and service to all existing and potential customers. With us you can always expect a little more and once you’re a client, it is hardly a fleeting experience but potentially a life-long partnership. To find out more about this vehicle, contact the dealer now
